If you are HIV positive, you can 
pass the virus on to your baby 
during pregnancy, at birth or 
when breastfeeding.
Vaginal birth after a 
caesarean section
Many women who have had a 
caesarean section can have a 
vaginal delivery for their next 
baby. This depends on why 
you had a caesarean section 
the	first	time.	Your	obstetrician	
will be able to advise you. 
Most women who are advised 
to try for a vaginal delivery in 
subseq
